ðŸŒˆ bio_palette_gallery(): Visualize All Palettes in a Gallery View

Source: R/bio_palette_gallery.R
bio_palette_gallery.Rd

Display palettes from a compiled RDS in a paged gallery format.

Usage

bio_palette_gallery(
  palette_rds = "data/palettes.rds",
  type = c("sequential", "diverging", "qualitative"),
  max_palettes = 30,
  max_row = 12,
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

palette_rds

Path to compiled RDS (default: "data/palettes.rds")

type

Palette types to include: "sequential", "diverging", "qualitative"

max_palettes

Number of palettes per page (default: 30)

max_row

Max colors per row (default: 12)

verbose

Whether to print summary/logs (default: TRUE)

Value

A named list of ggplot objects (one per page)

On this page
